Content.PageComment: these variables describe the physics of the coaster
natural or parabolic runout recycles some params from y spline
parameters for user interface for the knots of the splines

Content.Code:
pds0=(float)(N)*delta/(float)pn;
plotter ();
coaster_s=0; coaster_sv=0;
//t = 0; // appears to be not needed by weelk
controls_limits ();
coaster_set ();

Osejs.View.Creation.Element.Property: "Resets the simulation to its default state."
